## Data Analysis in a Snap {.inverse}

---

![](assets/penguins-data.png)

---

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
penguins <- read_csv("penguins.csv")
```

. . .

```{r}
penguins |>
  select(species:bill_length_mm)
```

---


```{r}
#| echo: true
penguins |>
  summarize(
    avg_bill_length = mean(
      bill_length_mm,
      na.rm = TRUE
    )
  )
```

---

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| code-line-numbers: "2"
penguins |>
  group_by(species, island) |>
  summarize(
    avg_bill_length = mean(
      bill_length_mm,
      na.rm = TRUE
    )
  )
```
